authority_registry_vc_path.description: Optional path(s) to signed Authority Registry VC(s). When present, verifiers may require trust anchors and VC signers to be authorized via this out-of-band registry chain (treaty → national → zone).

definition_vc_path.description: Path to a signed Corridor Definition VC binding corridor.yaml + security artifacts (hashes) to this corridor_id.

agreement_vc_path.description: Optional path(s) to signed Corridor Agreement VC(s) for participant-specific instantiation.

state_channel.description: Optional corridor state channel configuration (verifiable receipts, optional ZK proofs, optional anchoring).

transition_ruleset.description: Ruleset id for state transitions (default: msez.corridor.state-transition.v2).

transition_type_registry_path.description: Optional path to a transition type registry YAML file mapping transition kinds to schema/ruleset/ZK circuit digests. When present, receipt tooling may fill and/or validate transition digest references.

transition_type_registry_lock_path.description: Optional path to a transition type registry lock JSON file (content-addressed snapshot). When present, receipts MAY reference the snapshot_digest_sha256 instead of repeating per-transition digests.

accumulator.description: Optional receipt accumulator configuration (default: MMR) used to produce inclusion proofs without disclosing all receipts.

zk.description: Optional ZK acceptance configuration (proof systems, circuit/verifier digests).

anchor.description: Optional anchoring configuration for external chain commitments.
